description:
service is correctly disabled in the database (nova-manage service disable brontes nova-compute) and should be displayed as "brontes    nova-compute disabled  :-) 2011-02-21 11:42:32" by nova-manage service list. At the moment a service is hidden after setting "disabled = 1". After setting "disabled = 0" it's visible again.

ares:~ # nova-manage service disable brontes nova-compute
ares:~ # nova-manage service list
ares       nova-scheduler enabled  :-) 2011-02-21 11:41:10
ares       nova-network enabled  :-) 2011-02-21 11:41:10
ares       nova-compute enabled  :-) 2011-02-21 11:41:02
ares       nova-volume enabled  XXX 2011-02-16 19:04:29
brontes    nova-volume enabled  XXX 2011-02-12 18:31:43
brontes    nova-network enabled  :-) 2011-02-21 11:41:08

| 2011-02-12 17:34:58 | 2011-02-21 11:40:56 | NULL       |       0 |  5 | brontes | nova-compute   | compute   |        26003 |        1 | nova              |
title: bin/nova-manage hides disabled services

comments.content:
service is correctly disabled in the database (nova-manage service disable brontes nova-compute) and should be displayed as "brontes    nova-compute disabled  :-) 2011-02-21 11:42:32" by nova-manage service list. At the moment a service is hidden after setting "disabled = 1". After setting "disabled = 0" it's visible again.

ares:~ # nova-manage service disable brontes nova-compute
ares:~ # nova-manage service list
ares       nova-scheduler enabled  :-) 2011-02-21 11:41:10
ares       nova-network enabled  :-) 2011-02-21 11:41:10
ares       nova-compute enabled  :-) 2011-02-21 11:41:02
ares       nova-volume enabled  XXX 2011-02-16 19:04:29
brontes    nova-volume enabled  XXX 2011-02-12 18:31:43
brontes    nova-network enabled  :-) 2011-02-21 11:41:08

| 2011-02-12 17:34:58 | 2011-02-21 11:40:56 | NULL       |       0 |  5 | brontes | nova-compute   | compute   |        26003 |        1 | nova              |
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~berendt
